articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Nintendo shares tumble as Switch 2 reveal disappoints fans - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Japanese gaming company’s stock price falls as much as 7.2 percent as teaser for new console fails to impress.
articles.content:
Nintendo shares have taken a tumble after the gaming giants hotly anticipated reveal of its follow-up to the Switch left some fans disappointed.
The Japanese gaming companys stock price fell as much… [+1312 chars]
